成個atlassian families 其實整合得幾好

Jira同其他Atlassian軟件如Confluence都幾好用. The two use cases are:

1. Agile software development lifecycle management
2. Software support and issue tracking

for enterprise level既公司/project幾好用

replies.msg: 其實atlassian推廣緊細公司用cloud，不過果邊唔係我負責

3年前舊公司用呢啲

Issue Tracking (Kanban)
> custom workflow幾好玩
> dashboard行JIRA 自家既SQL，用黎計part-time同事係咪做夠時數
> 個人中意log time spent on task，睇住啲chart好滿足

Confluence for Knowledge Management
> 有得分類+tagging，內部用都易睇易搵
> 唔記得有冇Google Drive果種version control，有就正

Bitbucket
> PR / code review都方便
> commit message set到要跟格式，統一又易睇（唔知啲同事邊到搵script番黎）

Bamboo for Continuous Integration
> 好似好powerful，可惜公司冇行開 testing，貪佢方便 deploy / rollback

replies.msg:
Jira果個其實叫jql, time spent counting好似好多公司都有用
你地公司有冇用plugins去做?定係用default果個?

confluence有version control, 可以revert同埋睇difference, (簡任何兩個ver對diff)

Bb同bamboo冇乜點用(因為冇掂code, 亦唔係負責果邊),
不過code review/PR 應該係用Fisheye/Crucible做

巴打家下公司用緊咩SYSTEM TRACK ISSUES?
